file_content.text: Let me make this clear: I don't know you, and I don't talk to anyone I don't know. Get lost.
Come on. Someone as strong as you isn't afraid of retribution over sharing information.
I'm staying right here until you tell me what I want to know. Believe me, you don't want that.
I doubt you'd welcome undue attention, being a criminal and all, so how about this: if you won't talk, I'll talk.
Come on. Someone as strong as you isn't afraid of retribution over sharing information.
I'm staying right here until you tell me what I want to know. Believe me, you don't want that.
Oh, that's cheap. Deplorable, spineless, backbiting....
I'll tell you where to find the one you're after, and then hope I never see you again....
Heh. I still don't know you, but I gotta respect you. Yeah, I'll give you what you want....
Anyone's got a problem with me, they can try tell me all about it with my hands around their throat.
Pay attention. I'm only gonna relay the coordinates to you once....
Am I hearing you right? You're gonna do something? You think you can take me?
